title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services       Local Stores The Park is surrounded by local communities, where many goods and services are available, including gas stations, grocery stores, and other stores. For more information, contact local chambers of commerce. Consuming Alcohol Consuming alcohol in any public building, in parking lots and pull-outs. It is illegal to be in the park when under the influence of alcohol or controlled substances.The possession of alcoholic beverages by a minor (less than 21 years old) is prohibited. Post Office There are three local post offices that are located trough out the whole region of Paterson, NJ. First one is located at 194 Ward St, the second one is located is 497 21st Ave, and the last post office is located at 958 Main St #1.
